a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Estimated share of males versus females who have
schizophrenia
, whether or not they are diagnosed, based
on representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)

Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is
age-standardized
.
